title: Optical pacing of the embryonic heart
abstract: Light has been used to non-invasively alter the excitability of both neural and cardiac tissue. Recently, pulsed laser light has been shown to be capable of eliciting action potentials in peripheral nerves and in cultured cardiomyocytes. Here, for the first time, we demonstrate optical pacing of an intact heart in vivo. Pulsed 1.875-µm infrared laser light was used to lock the heart rate to the pulse frequency of the laser. A laser Doppler velocimetry signal was used to verify the pacing. At low radiant exposures, embryonic quail hearts were reliably paced in vivo without detectable damage to the tissue, indicating that optical pacing has great potential as a tool with which to study embryonic cardiac dynamics and development. In particular, optical pacing can be used to control the heart rate, thereby altering stresses and mechanically transduced signalling.
abstract_cn: 光已经用于非侵入性地改变神经和心脏组织的兴奋性。 近来，已显示脉冲激光能够在周围神经和培养的心肌细胞中引起动作电位。 在这里，我们首次在体内展示了完整心脏的光学起搏。 使用脉冲1.875-＃m红外激光将心率锁定在激光的脉冲频率上。 激光多普勒测速仪信号用于验证起搏。 在低辐射照射下，胚胎鹌鹑心脏在体内可靠地起搏，而对组织没有可检测到的损伤，这表明光学起搏作为研究胚胎心脏动力学和发育的工具具有巨大的潜力。 特别是，光学起搏器可用于控制心率，从而改变压力和机械传导的信号传导。</ p>

title: Broadband terahertz wave remote sensing using coherent manipulation of fluorescence from asymmetrically ionized gases
title_cn: 使用非对称电离气体的荧光的相干操纵的宽带太赫兹波遥感
abstract: Terahertz wave sensing and imaging have received a great deal of attention because of their significant scientific and technological potential in multidisciplinary fields. However, owing to the challenge of dealing with high ambient moisture absorption, the development of remote open-air broadband terahertz spectroscopy is lagging behind the urgent need for the technology that exists in homeland security and the fields of astronomy and environmental monitoring. The requirement for on-site bias or forward collection of the optical signal in conventional terahertz detection techniques has inevitably prohibited their use in remote sensing. We introduce an ‘all-optical’ technique of broadband terahertz wave detection by coherently manipulating the fluorescence emission from asymmetrically ionized gas plasma interacting with terahertz waves. Owing to the high atmospheric transparency and omnidirectional emission pattern of the fluorescence, this technique can be used to measure terahertz pulses at standoff distances with minimal water vapour absorption and unlimited directionality for optical signal collection. We demonstrate coherent terahertz wave detection at a distance of 10 m.
abstract_cn: 太赫兹波感测和成像由于其在多学科领域中的重大科学技术潜力而受到广泛关注。然而，由于应对高的环境水分吸收的挑战，远程露天宽带太赫兹光谱学的发展落后于对国土安全以及天文学和环境监测领域中存在的技术的迫切需求。在传统的太赫兹检测技术中，需要对光信号进行现场偏置或正向采集，这不可避免地禁止了它们在遥感中的使用。我们介绍了“全光学”相干操纵与太赫兹波相互作用的非对称电离气体等离子体的荧光发射，从而实现宽带太赫兹波检测的技术。由于荧光具有很高的大气透明性和全向发射模式，因此该技术可用于在间隔距离处测量太赫兹脉冲，而水蒸气的吸收最少，光信号采集的方向性不受限制。我们演示了相距太赫兹波检测在10＆＃160; m的距离。</ p>

title: Two-photon interference of the emission from electrically tunable remote quantum dots
title_cn: 电可调远程量子点发射的双光子干扰
abstract: Self-assembled quantum dots comprise a versatile system with which to study quantum effects in the solid state. Many devices have been developed that demonstrate controlled charging of a quantum dot, Rabi oscillations, coherent spin control and electrically injected non-classical photon emission. Often referred to as ‘artificial atoms’, quantum dots have discrete energy levels, making them a viable candidate for encoding qubits. However, unlike single atoms, no two quantum dots are alike. This is a complication for quantum-information applications that require qubits initialized in the same state and interactions between remote systems mediated by indistinguishable photons. We report that truly remote, independent, quantum dots can be tuned to the same energy using large applied electric fields. This allows two-photon interference of their emission under coincidence gating and opens up the possibility of transferring quantum information between remote solid-state sources.
abstract_cn: 自组装量子点包括一个通用系统，可用于研究固态量子效应。已经开发出许多设备，它们证明了量子点的受控充电，拉比振荡，相干自旋控制和电注入非经典光子发射。量子点通常被称为“人造原子”，具有离散的能级，使其成为编码量子位的可行候选者。但是，与单个原子不同，没有两个量子点是相同的。这对于要求以相同状态初始化的量子位以及由不可区分的光子介导的远程系统之间的相互作用的量子信息应用程序来说是一种复杂情况。我们报告说，可以使用大的施加电场将真正遥远，独立的量子点调整为相同的能量。这允许在重合闸作用下其发射的双光子干扰，并开辟了在远程固态源之间传递量子信息的可能性。

title: Phase-locking of a 2.7-THz quantum cascade laser to a mode-locked erbium-doped fibre laser
title_cn: 2.7THz量子级联激光器与锁模掺-光纤激光器的锁相
abstract: Mode-locked femtosecond lasers have revolutionized the field of optical metrology by allowing the realization of ultra-stable phase-coherent links between the optical-frequency domain and the radiofrequency range. In this work we have used the electro-optic effect in ZnTe (ref. ) to demonstrate that the frequency and the phase of a 2.7 THz quantum cascade laser can be actively stabilized to the nth harmonic of the 90 MHz repetition rate (frep) of a commercial, mode-locked erbium-doped fibre laser. The beating between the stabilized quantum cascade laser frequency and the harmonic of frep yield a signal-to-noise ratio of 80 dB in a bandwidth of 1 Hz. The technique is inherently broadband, that is, it is applicable to any quantum cascade laser source provided that its frequency falls within the spectral bandwidth of the femtosecond laser (∼5 THz). Furthermore, it is an ideal tool with which to control the phase of different quantum cascade lasers using light and compact fibre technology rather than superconducting bolometer mixers.
abstract_cn: 锁模飞秒激光器通过实现光频域和射频范围之间超稳定的相位相干链接，彻底改变了光学计量领域。在这项工作中，我们已经使用ZnTe中的电光效应（参考文献）证明2.7THz量子级联激光器的频率和相位可以稳定地稳定在ZnTe的n次谐波上。商业锁模掺光纤激光器的重复频率（f rep ）为90＆＃160; MHz。稳定的量子级联激光器频率与f rep 谐波之间的跳动在1 Hz的带宽中产生80 dB的信噪比。该技术本质上是宽带的，也就是说，只要其频率落在飞秒激光器的光谱带宽内（＆＃8764; 5 THz），它就可以应用于任何量子级联激光源。此外，它是一种理想的工具，可以使用光和紧凑型光纤技术而不是超导辐射热计混频器来控制不同量子级联激光器的相位。

title: First lasing and operation of an ångstrom-wavelength free-electron laser
title_cn: 埃涅斯特波长自由电子激光器的首次发射和运行
abstract: The recently commissioned Linac Coherent Light Source is an X-ray free-electron laser at the SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory. It produces coherent soft and hard X-rays with peak brightness nearly ten orders of magnitude beyond conventional synchrotron sources and a range of pulse durations from 500 to <10 fs (10−15 s). With these beam characteristics this light source is capable of imaging the structure and dynamics of matter at atomic size and timescales. The facility is now operating at X-ray wavelengths from 22 to 1.2 Å and is presently delivering this high-brilliance beam to a growing array of scientific researchers. We describe the operation and performance of this new ‘fourth-generation light source’.
abstract_cn: 最近启用的直线加速器相干光源是SLAC国家加速器实验室的X射线自由电子激光器。 它产生相干的软X射线和硬X射线，其峰值亮度比常规同步辐射源高出近十个数量级，脉冲持续时间范围从500到＆lt; 10＆＃160; fs（10 ＆＃8722; 15 ＆＃160; s）。 具有这些光束特性，该光源能够在原子尺寸和时标下成像物质的结构和动力学。 该设施现在在从22到1.2的X射线波长下运行。 并且目前正在将这种高亮度光束传送给越来越多的科研人员。 我们描述了这种新型＆＃8216;第四代光源＆＃8217;

title: High-speed ultracompact buried heterostructure photonic-crystal laser with 13 fJ of energy consumed per bit transmitted
title_cn: 高速超紧凑型隐埋异质结构光子晶体激光器，每传输比特消耗能量13 fJ
abstract: The ability to directly modulate a nanocavity laser with ultralow power consumption is essential for the realization of a CMOS-integrated, on-chip photonic network, as several thousand lasers must be integrated onto a single chip. Here, we show high-speed direct modulation (3-dB modulation bandwidth of 5.5 GHz) of an ultracompact InP/InGaAsP buried heterostructure photonic-crystal laser at room temperature by optical pumping. The required energy for transmitting one bit is estimated to be 13 fJ. We also achieve a threshold input power of 1.5 µW, which is the lowest observed value for room-temperature continuous-wave operation of any type of laser. The maximum single-mode fibre output power of 0.44 µW is the highest output power, to our knowledge, for photonic-crystal nanocavity lasers under room-temperature continuous-wave operation. Implementing a buried heterostructure leads to excellent device performance, reducing the active region temperature and effectively confining the carriers inside the cavity.
abstract_cn: 具有超低功耗的直接调制纳米腔激光器的能力对于实现CMOS集成的片上光子网络至关重要，因为必须将数千个激光器集成到单个芯片上。在这里，我们显示了通过光泵浦在室温下对超紧凑InP / InGaAsP埋入异质结构光子晶体激光器进行的高速直接调制（3-dB调制带宽为5.5＆＃160; GHz）。传输一位所需的能量估计为13 fJ。我们还实现了1.5W的阈值输入功率，这是任何类型的激光器在室温下连续波工作的最低观测值。就我们所知，在室温连续波操作下，光子晶体纳米腔激光器的最大单模光纤输出功率为0.44＆＃160; W。实施掩埋异质结构可实现出色的器件性能，降低有源区温度并将载流子有效地限制在腔体内。

title: Non-Gaussian operation based on photon subtraction using a photon-number-resolving detector at a telecommunications wavelength
title_cn: 使用光子数分辨检测器在电信波长下基于光子减法的非高斯运算
abstract: We have implemented non-Gaussian operation in pulsed squeezed vacuum at a telecommunications wavelength. A one- or two-photon-subtracted squeezed state was generated using a titanium superconducting transition-edge sensor to resolve the incident photon number. We observed dips in the reconstructed Wigner functions of the generated quantum states, which provides clear evidence that non-Gaussian operation has been realized.
abstract_cn: 我们已在电信波长的脉冲压缩真空中实施了非高斯操作。 使用钛超导过渡边缘传感器生成一或两个光子相减的压缩状态，以解决入射光子数。 我们观察到生成的量子态在重构的维格纳函数中存在下降，这为实现非高斯运算提供了明确的证据。
